archimate:BusinessActor.name: Insurance Providers
archimate:BusinessActor.documentation:
Insurance Providers
• Purpose: Integration with health insurance companies for eligibility verification, prior authorization, and claims processing • Data Exchange: Patient coverage details, copay information, authorization status, claims submissions, and payment notifications • Integration Methods: EDI transactions (837, 835, 270/271), REST APIs, batch file transfers • Critical Functions: Real-time eligibility checks, automated claims submission, payment posting, denial management
